user_query: Can you provide me with the details of the last game played by the Golden State Warriors and the upcoming game for the Los Angeles Lakers? Also, fetch the player stats for Stephen Curry and LeBron James. Additionally, give me the daily OHLCV records for Litecoin from the BraveNewCoin API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the details of the last game played by the Golden State Warriors.
Fetch the details of the upcoming game for the Los Angeles Lakers.
Fetch player statistics for Stephen Curry.
Fetch player statistics for LeBron James.
Fetch daily OHLCV records for Litecoin from the BraveNewCoin API.
